title: Bug 114905: Default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: No default value was set. After step 5, the OK button can still be used.
EB: Change the Display type to Combo Box. Expected result: The default value should be set as 'aaa'. After step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc'. Set 'aa' as the default value and click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa', and click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. 5. [Missing step information, please provide more details.]
